installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

## Delete, create and enter source folder
rm -rf source
mkdir source
cd source


if !([ "${BRANCH}" == "master" ] || [ "${BRANCH}" == "dev" ]) ; then
    BRANCH="master"
    echo -e "Set branch to ${BRANCH}"
fi


echo -e "Cloning ${BRANCH} branch"
git clone --branch "${BRANCH}" https://github.com/cub1con/TeamspeakActivityBot.git
git clone https://github.com/cub1con/TeamSpeak3QueryApi.git

cd ..

## Patch version to include branch
sed -i 's|</Version>|\-'"${BRANCH}"'</Version>|g' source/TeamspeakActivityBot/TeamspeakActivityBot/TeamspeakActivityBot.csproj

echo -e "Building Bot"
dotnet publish source/TeamspeakActivityBot/TeamspeakActivityBot.sln -p:PublishProfile=LinuxSingleFileFolderProfile --configuration Release -o /mnt/server

echo -e "Cleanup"
rm -rf source

if [ ! -f config.json ] && [ -f config.json-dist ]
then
	echo "Copy default config"
	cp config.json-dist config.json
fi

echo -e "Done!"
